DOC.brief_summary: Study IPI-504-15 Phase 1b/2 clinical trial evaluate safety efficacy retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) plus everolimus patient KRAS mutant Non-small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1b/2 Study Retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) Combination With Everolimus KRAS Mutant Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase Ib/2 study retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) combination everolimus . The Phase 1b portion test safety tolerability retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) combination everolimus determine high dose retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) everolimus safely give combination . The Phase 2 portion study continue evaluation safety retaspimycin HCl ( IPI-504 ) combination everolimus compare effect study drug tumor response life expectancy patient KRAS mutant NSCLC .
DOC.criteria: 1 . â‰¥18 year age 2 . Voluntarily sign informed consent form ( ICF ) . 3 . Pathological diagnosis KRAS mutation positive NSCLC Stage IIIB IV 4 . Archival NSCLC tissue available provide analysis lesion accessible biopsy 5 . Experienced disease progression receive least 1 prior platinumcontaining chemotherapy regimen . 6 . ECOG performance 01 . 1 . Prior treatment IPI504 Hsp90 inhibitor . 2 . Prior treatment everolimus , rapamycin analog , AP23573 ( Ridaforolimus ) , rapamycin , mTOR inhibitor . 3 . Has recover toxicity relate prior treatment ( Grade 1 baseline ) , exclude alopecia . 4 . Inadequate hematologic function define : 5 . Inadequate hepatic function define : 6 . Inadequate renal function define serum creatinine > 1.5 x ULN .
